amendatorysection.para: Any person who violates a permanent injunction obtained pursuant to section 81-8,204, presents or attempts to file as his or her own the certificate of licensure of another, gives false or forged evidence of any kind to the board in obtaining a certificate of licensure, indorses any document which he or she did not actually prepare or supervise the preparation thereof, falsely impersonates another practitioner of like or different name, or uses a revoked certificate of licensure shall be deemed guilty of a Class III misdemeanor.
